newsitem.title: USA: Philips U.S. unit to close some operations.
newsitem.headline: Philips U.S. unit to close some operations.

text.p: Philips Consumer Electronics Co, a unit of Philips Electronics North America Corp and part of Philips Electronics N.V., said Monday it will close the Greeneville, Tenn., refurbishing operations in Plant 2 beginning in late January.
The closure will be completed by March 31, after which the company will outsource its refurbishing work.
The decision will result in the layoff of about 160 employees during the first quarter of 1997, Philips said.
Discussions about the disposition of parts warehousing operations in Plant 2 are continuing, the company said.
